column1: A memorial service will be held 1:30 PM Friday
column4: in Ashland. Visitation will be held one hour prior to the service on Friday at the funeral home. A graveside service for Paul and Corrinne
column5: will be held at Mt. Hope Cemetery
column6: in Ashland. A United Chequamegon Veterans service for Paul will immediately follow the graveside service at Mt. Hope Cemetery
